page.title: 14PEASLAKE VILLAGE STORES
page.content: Peaslake Stores has always been a shop. It is open from 8.30_5.l5 p.m. Monday to Friday and on Saturday 8.30_l p.m. One full time person helps and four part-time people. The Post Office is separate from the shop but Mr. Street serves both. Most people who use the Post Office also buy from the shop. Mr.Street sells more food than anything else, next papers, then bread, then vegetables, then sweets, then household items, then fruit, then stationery. Bread, papers and dairy produce are delivered.Other groceries and goods have to be collected. The shop sells many unusual local goods like pork sausages, smoked turkey, mustard and honey. The busiest day is Saturday. There are about 700 customers a week, mostly from Peaslake. Orders are delivered to two old people only each week.
